description: Bea`s Hitmontop was first seen in a group shot together with Bea`s other Fighting-type Pokémon. In the official Pokémon World Championships rematch battle vs Pikachu at the Tanba Gym in the Jouto region, Pikachu`s Electroweb slowed it down a lot which was Ash Ketchum`s strategy and he was able to defeat Hitmontop.
name: Kapoerer (Saitou)
